CustomProfile.Description: After Burner Climax is a high-speed jet combat arcade game where you pilot a modern fighter jet through explosive skies filled with enemy aircraft, missiles, and nonstop action. With blistering speed and cinematic camera angles, you activate Climax Mode to slow time and lock onto multiple targets, unleashing devastating missile salvos in a race against the clock. Designed to immerse you in the cockpit, every moment is about adrenaline, reflexes, and aerial domination.
